vmassol - (16/12/2008 14:49): asyd: cool http://blog.asyd.net/2008/12/xwiki-cest-decidemment-magique/  
asyd - (16/12/2008 14:49): :)  
asyd - (16/12/2008 14:50): regarding this app. I'm wondering how to add somethings like hook, for exemple I want to execute comme velocity/groovy code each time an user is created  
asyd - (16/12/2008 14:50): is that possible w/o changes xwiki sources?  
asyd - (16/12/2008 14:52): xwiki + velocity/groovy is very nice

asyd - (16/12/2008 15:02): oh by jvdrean, this friday evening, it's my .. pot de depart :) same place than the last time  
jvdrean - (16/12/2008 15:06): asyd: do you receive my PM ?  
jvdrean - (16/12/2008 15:06): (I'm not sure since IIRC I need an real account on freenode for that)  
asyd - (16/12/2008 15:14): yeah, done  
asyd - (16/12/2008 15:14): thanks
